abstract: The key that represents the version of the ad network API.
overview:
## Discussion

The value for this key is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString]. Set this key to version number “`4.0`”, “`3.0`”, “`2.2"`, `“2.1"`, or `"2.0"`. Use the highest available version whenever possible. For version availability, see [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/skadnetwork-release-notes].

Ad networks use this key and the other [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/ad-network-install-validation-keys] when signing ads. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/generating-the-signature-to-validate-storekit-rendered-ads].

# SKStoreProductParameterAdNetworkVersion

**Global Variable**

The key that represents the version of the ad network API.

## Declaration

```swift
let SKStoreProductParameterAdNetworkVersion: String
```

## Discussion

The value for this key is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString]. Set this key to version number “`4.0`”, “`3.0`”, “`2.2"`, `“2.1"`, or `"2.0"`. Use the highest available version whenever possible. For version availability, see [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/skadnetwork-release-notes].

Ad networks use this key and the other [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/ad-network-install-validation-keys] when signing ads. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/generating-the-signature-to-validate-storekit-rendered-ads].

## Required keys for SKAdNetwork 2 and later

- **SKStoreProductParameterAdNetworkSourceAppStoreIdentifier**: The key that represents the App Store ID of the app that displays the ad.
